definition: Lop Nor, salt lake and nuclear testing site in Xinjiang
cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known

sentences.english: The first thing to consider in going across Lop Nor is taking risks.
sentences.chinese: 穿越罗布泊首先考虑的是风险。

sentences.english: The Lop Nor region is one of the driest regions in the world.
sentences.chinese: 罗布泊地区是世界上最干旱的地区之一。

sentences.english: Aqike valley is the east extended area of Lop Nur, Xinjiang.
sentences.chinese: 阿其克谷地是罗布泊洼地的东延部分。

pinyin: Ku4 mu3 ta3 ge2 Sha1 mo4

definition: Tsaidam or Qaidam basin (Mongolian: salt marsh), depression northeast of the Plateau of Tibet, located between the Qilian Shan and the Kunlun Shan at the northern margin of the Tibetan Plateau.
